dmca.title: Who's Trying to Cash In?
dmca.body:
[private]

This office represents the Estate of John R. Cash.  You were offering for sale unauthorized merchandise, trading on the name, trademark and persona of Johnny Cash.  Such t-shirt, and the advertisement therefor, constitutes an unauthorized commercial use of Mr. Cash's name and likeness.  Without permission from the Estate, this constitutes a violation of the Lanham Act and rights of publicity controlled by the Estate, in addition to rights of copyright that must be licensed from the applicable publishers of the lyrical content.  Should you require further information, you may wish to consult an attorney.

Thank you for your cooperation in refraining from further listing such items.
